title: Gravity
description: Clare Daniels has spent her entire college career with Nolan West by her side and in her bed. They’ve spent years together, but they can barely say they’re friends. Clare can’t handle the possessiveness and jealousy of a man who isn’t even her boyfriend. Nolan only understands that Clare is his and he’ll do anything to keep other men away. Every time she tries to get away, he pulls her back in. A betrayal of a relationship neither believed they were in, brings to light their messed up situation. What will happen when Clare finally breaks away? Will the loss pull her apart?After all, she’s always been stuck in his gravity.
author: K.I. Lynn
